TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReceiveMarkupExtension

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("IReceiveMarkupExtension has been deprecated. This interface is no longer in use.")

summary.span: 提供型別可以宣告它們能夠接受來自標記延伸運算式 (或其他類別) 的一種機制，其中輸出會是有別於目標屬性的另一種屬性。

span.span: Provides a mechanism whereby types can declare that they can receive an expression (or another class) from a markup extension, where the output is a different property type than the target property.

summary.span: 請勿用於 .NET Framework 4 實作。

span.span: Do not use for .NET Framework 4 implementations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]，是 WPF 特有的技術允許輸入每當它的任何 XAML 可存取成員，將設為標記延伸在 XAML 剖析期間不同程式碼路徑的類型。In [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)], was a WPF-specific technique for permitting types to enter a different codepath whenever any of its XAML-accessible members where set as markup extensions during XAML parsing. 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、 此介面已過時，而且會取代標記延伸模組可以如何接收服務的.NET Framework XAML 服務實作或型別可以叫用標記延伸模組特定 setter 邏輯。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], this interface is obsolete, and is replaced with a .NET Framework XAML Services implementation for how markup extensions can receive services or types can invoke markup-extension specific setter logic. 針對[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]實作中，如果想要執行特殊處理，當標記延伸模組，而不透過其他方式，設定屬性類型應該定義類型與套用的屬性。For [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] implementations, if types want to perform special processing when setting properties by markup extension rather than by other means, types should be defined with attributes applied. 此屬性指定的回呼，通常會定義為私用成員的型別。The attribute specifies a callback, which is typically defined as a private member of the type. 在 WPF 類別的基礎結構實作中，最情況是套用參考`ReceiveMarkupExtension`先前實作這個介面，但現在改用的方法會使用透過回呼的內容。In infrastructure implementations of WPF classes, most cases where is applied reference a `ReceiveMarkupExtension` method that previously implemented this interface, but now instead use context through the callback.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ReceiveMarkupExtension (string property, System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension markupExtension, IServiceProvider serviceProvider);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ReceiveMarkupExtension(string property, class System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension markupExtension, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
public: void ReceiveMarkupExtension(System::String ^ property, System::Windows::Markup::MarkupExtension ^ markupExtension, IServiceProvider ^ serviceProvider);
abstract member ReceiveMarkupExtension : string * System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension * IServiceProvider -> unit

span.span: The name of the target property.

param.name: markupExtension
param.span: 傳入資料的標記延伸執行個體。

span.span: The markup extension instance of the incoming data.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可以提供應該在處理屬性值之標記延伸資料時執行的其他服務。

span.span: Can provide additional services that should be performed when processing the markup extension data for a property value.

summary.span: 能夠處理可以提供屬性值的標記延伸。

span.span: Provides the handling for markup extensions that provide property values.

summary.span: 請勿用於 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 實作，請參閱 。

span.span: Do not use for [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] implementations; see .
